app.title: 7 Cogs Hook

app.description: The Seven Cogs App represents a sample site, installed by default in Liferay installations. This component provides backend functionality.
app.changeLog: Adapted for the latest version of Liferay.

app.title: Chat
app.subTitle: This app provides in-browser, realtime chat support, including support for Jabber/XMPP.
app.description: This app provides in-browser, realtime chat support, including support for Jabber/XMPP.
app.changeLog: Adapted for the latest version of Liferay.

app.title: Google Maps
app.subTitle: Easily display dynamic maps on your site using Google Maps.
app.description: This app provides an integration with Google Maps. Google Maps is a map service that you view in your web browser. Depending on your location, you can view basic or custom maps and local business information, including business locations, contact information, and driving directions. Click and drag maps to view adjacent sections immediately. View satellite images of your desired location that you can zoom and pan.
app.changeLog: Adapted for the latest version of Liferay.

app.title: OpenSocial
app.subTitle: Integrates Google OpenSocial gadgets into Liferay.
app.description: This app provides an OpenSocial container based on Apache Shindig, allowing OpenSocial Gadgets to be seemlessly integrated into Liferay Portal. The OpenSocial API is fully implemented, and hooks into Liferay's underlying social graph and features. OpenSocial defines a common API for social applications across multiple websites. With standard JavaScript and HTML, developers can create apps that access a social network's friends and update feeds.
app.changeLog: Adapted for the latest version of Liferay.

app.title: Twitter
app.subTitle: Twitter Integration
app.description: This app integrates Twitter feeds directly into the Liferay Portal platform. Twitter is an online social networking and microblogging service that enables its users to send and read text-based posts of up to 140 characters, informally known as "tweets", and images.
app.changeLog: Adapted for the latest version of Liferay.

app.title: Web Form
app.subTitle: Web Forms for Liferay
app.description: This app allows easy creation of online web forms which can be submitted to maintainers of a Liferay-based site.
app.changeLog: Adapted for the latest version of Liferay.

app.subTitle: A sleek, modern, corporate theme that has built in featured sections.
app.description: A sleek, modern, corporate theme that has built in featured sections.
app.changeLog: Adapted for the latest version of Liferay.
